channel.title: Hacker News - English
channel.description: Hacker News articles summarized and translated to English

item.title: Paris had a moving sidewalk in 1900, and a Thomas Edison film captured it (2020)
item.description:
The inno­va­tion of the mov­ing side­walk demon­strat­ed at the Paris Expo­si­tion of 1900 (pre­vi­ous­ly seen here on Open Cul­ture when we fea­tured Lumière Broth­ers footage of that peri­od) com­mand­ed even Thomas Edis­on’s atten­tion. ” Novak fea­tures con­tem­po­rary images of the Paris Exhi­bi­tion’s mov­ing side­walk at Pale­o­fu­ture, found in the book Paris Expo­si­tion Repro­duced From the Offi­cial Pho­tographs. You can learn more about this first mov­ing walk­way and its suc­ces­sors, the one at the Paris Exhi­bi­tion includ­ed, from the Lit­tle Car video above.

Read more

item.title: Facts about throwing good parties
item.description:
Start by inviting your closest friends, get some yesses, then expand from there. Follow your instinct on this, even if your instinct feels rude. 12) Co-host parties with someone you like a lot but who isn't in your exact social circle, so that your two friend-sets can intermingle.

Read more

item.title: Alleged Jabber Zeus Coder 'MrICQ' in U.S. Custody
item.description:
The Jabber Zeus name is derived from the malware they used — a custom version of the ZeuS banking trojan — that stole banking login credentials and would send the group a Jabber instant message each time a new victim entered a one-time passcode at a financial institution website. Baldwin said the Jabber Zeus crew was far ahead of its peers in several respects. The core innovation of Jabber Zeus was an alert that MrICQ would receive each time a new victim entered a one-time password code into a phishing page mimicking their financial institution.

Read more

item.title: FurtherAI (Series A – A16Z, YC) Is Hiring Across Software and AI
item.description:
FurtherAI (Series A, a16z + YC) is hiring Software Engineers, AI Engineers, and Forward-Deployed Engineers. Highlights: - $25M Series A led by Andreessen Horowitz (a16z) - >10× revenue growth this year - Seed -> Series A in under a year - Small, talent-dense team - 6/15 are founders (incl. 4 YC founders) - Team backgrounds include staff engineers and researchers from Apple, Microsoft, Amazon Hiring strong engineers based in SF who want high ownership, fast shipping, and real impact.

Read more
